Body:
board = [[' ', ' ', 'C'], ['Z', ' ', ' '], [' ', 'Z', ' ']]
ga = Genetic(board, direction='izquierda', number_individuals=2,
    number_generations=1, crossover=None, mutation_rate=100)
individual_tested = Individual(gene=['V', ' ', 'C', 'Z', ' ', ' ', '>', 'Z',
    ' '])
ga.rows_in_board = 3
ga.cols_in_board = 3
ga.calculate_fitness([individual_tested])
assert individual_tested.fitness == 236
